acute_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Acute
acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 2 from 96 hours LC50=3.5mg/L of the fish (Carp) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 2004).

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: Based on the rat LD50 (dermal roue) value of >5,000mg/kg (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.hazard_name: Acute toxicity Inhalation: Dusts and mists
acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: Classification cannot be determined, though the available rat inhalation study reported the LC50 value of >0.55mg/L (4 hours) (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

acute_toxicity_inhalation_gas.rationale: Due to the fact that the substance is a solid according to the GHS criteria and inhalation of its gas is not expected.

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: Based on the rat LD50 (oral route) value of >5,000mg/kg (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

carcinogenicity.rationale: There was no treatment-related increase in tumor incidence observed in rat and mouse carcinogenicity studies (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Long-term
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_statement: Toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Although acute toxicity was Category 2 and the bio-accumulation potential was low (BCF=203(Agricultural Chemical Registration Data, 1979)), since there was no rapidly degrading (BIOWIN()), it was classified into Category 2.

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Test methods applicable to solid substances with melting point of >55degC are not available (melting point: 125.8-147.1degC (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data)).

explosives.rationale: Containing no chemical groups with explosive properties

flammable_gases.hazard_name: Flammable gases including chemically unstable gases
flammable_gases.rationale: Classified as "solid" according to GHS definition

flammable_liquids.rationale: Classified as "solid" according to GHS definition

flammable_solids.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

gases_under_pressure.rationale: Classified as "solid" according to GHS definition

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: Based on negative data in in vitro reverse mutation tests, in vitro chromosome aberration tests (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)) and in vivo micronucleus tests on mouse bone marrow cells (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

oxidizing_gases.rationale: Classified as "solid" according to GHS definition

oxidizing_liquids.rationale: Classified as "solid" according to GHS definition

oxidizing_solids.rationale: Organic compounds containing oxygen (but not fluorine and chlorine), with the oxygen bound to carbon and hydrogen (but not to other elements)

pyrophoric_liquids.rationale: Classified as "solid" according to GHS definition

pyrophoric_solids.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

reproductive_toxicity.hazard_statement: Suspected of damaging fertility or the unborn child
reproductive_toxicity.rationale: Based on the evidence of delayed ossification in the pups, reduced female fertility, increased incidence of resorptions/fetal malformation at doses causing a reduction in parental body weight gain observed in rat/rabbit teratogenicity studies (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

self_heating_substances.rationale: Test method applicable to liquid substances are not available (melting point: 125.8-147.1degC (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data), test temperature: 140degC). The substances with melting point of  >140degC cannot be classified due to lack of data.

self_reactive_substances.rationale: Containing no chemical groups with explosive or self-reactive properties

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: Based on the evidence of mild irritation with a Draize score of <=1, which cleared at 72 hours, observed in rabbit eye irritation tests (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: Based on no evidence of irritation in rabbit skin irritation tests (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

skin_sensitizer.rationale: No skin sensitizing potential was found in guinea pig sensitization tests (Agricultural Chemical Registration Data (1984)).

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures which, in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: Containing no metals or metalloids (B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At)

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Repeated exposure

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Single exposure
